roadmap.title: 12-Month Launch Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Recommended path for a founder entering the AVGC-XR space today (Teacher Training + LMS strategy).

phases.title: Research, Network & Register
phases.desc: Visit IICT Mumbai. Meet Karnataka/Maharashtra state AVGC cells. Register company under Startup India. Identify 3 pilot schools. Attend India AI Impact Summit & AVGC events to build relationships.

phases.title: Build MVP & Run Pilot Training
phases.desc: Design a 5-day teacher bootcamp curriculum. Partner with 2-3 AVGC experts. Run free pilot in 2 schools. Collect data, testimonials, impact metrics. Build basic LMS with course content.

phases.title: First Paying Clients & Grant Applications
phases.desc: Pitch 5 schools/colleges for paid training (‚Çπ2‚Äì5L per batch). Apply for Startup India Seed Fund, NASSCOM Foundation grants, or state AVGC policy grants. Publish case study from pilot.

phases.title: State Government MoU & Series of Contracts
phases.desc: With pilot proof, approach state education departments for bulk MoU (100+ schools). Raise angel/seed round. Hire curriculum designers & sales. Launch online certification program for teachers nationwide.

phases.title: Multi-State Expansion + LMS Revenue
phases.desc: Expand to 3+ states. Launch student-facing LMS subscriptions (‚Çπ999/month/school). Begin building AVGC Talent Marketplace with students from partner schools. Target 500 teachers trained, 50 schools onboarded.

gaps.title: Gap Analysis ‚Äî What's Missing in the Market
gaps.subtitle: Where the policy creates demand but no organized business exists yet. These are your entry points.
gaps.risks: Budget clarity is still vague ‚Äî no multi-year roadmap. Past AVGC announcements (2022 Task Force) stalled at implementation. Build your business to survive slow govt rollout by also targeting private schools & colleges from day one.
gaps.wins: Governments prefer to scale with vendors who already have proof points. If you're training teachers & building curriculum before 2027, you'll be the go-to partner when ‚Çπ250Cr starts flowing. Network effects compound early.
